scripts.dev:clean: docker compose down -v --remove-orphans && docker volume prune -f
scripts.gen:types: npx supabase gen types typescript --db-url "postgresql://postgres:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your-super-secret-and-long-postgres-password}@localhost:5432/postgres" > packages/frontend/src/types/database.ts
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down db && docker volume rm fomo_db-config || true && docker compose up db -d
scripts.logs:supabase: docker compose logs -f db rest auth meta studio kong
